hackathon-description-text: Join other digital currency enthusiasts to learn about and innovate applications of digital currency technology.
hackathon-eligibility:
Residents of the United States with at least one team member located in New York City metropolitan area.
All in-person attendees will receive an exclusive discount code for the
hackathon-requirements: Submit link to executable, video of working application, written description, and/or provide on-site demo during event.
hackathon-rules: Participants are free to work on any project, but certain prize eligibility criteria may be limited to projects for which work must have begun on or after 1/1/2014.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Inside Bitcoins Conference pass for outstanding team(s).

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The event is also serving as a satellite for the MHacks.org hackathon taking place in Michigan over the same weekend for undergraduate particpants.
Grand Central may offer office space, incubation services, and possible seed investment to entrepreneurs interested in collaborating with other start-ups.
Most popular projects by participant votes.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Improve security of cryptocurrency storage, transactions, or other exchanges.

hackathon-description-header: Build tools that expand accessibility, utility, or application of cyptocurrency or other digital currency technologies.
